timeline.message:
Fix move console left/right command

Without this, the View / Panes / Console on Left (or Right) commands didn't change anything until you reloaded the UI.

Fixes #7405

timeline.bodyText: Looking into it, we don't seem to ever fire UpdateTabPanelsEvent so I think we should get rid of this handler and the event.
